content: Cool! I actually got turned onto Zazzle by Scott Hanselman with custom stamps, but I love this shirt. Although I'm stealing your design now and building one for SharePoint ;)
Send me the link to the shirt when you're done!
We build a website to allow you to design for free. The site is at http://www.mootif.com. Give it a try and send us feedback. This is pretty new. Thanks.
